thread.section_title: WineOnline.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WineOnline.ie | wineonline.ie
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: I'm in Australia and ordered some champagne to be delivered to my friend in Ireland. WineOnline were so patient and attempted to deliver 3 times before being successful. They could have said no. It's great to know you can trust them to go above and beyond, especially when you're on the other side of the world with a different currency and no idea about area codes for phone number etc. I'll use them every time now. Excellent service.
